channel.title: I Can't Host My Server
channel.description:
I followed this tutorial http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html to the book and I'm still getting error connecting to server messages. :(
Please offer any advice on steps I should take/change to get a private server running :)
Here are screenshots of every step I completed, everything should be working - but it's not :mad:
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/ErrorConnectingtoServer.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/No-IPisWorking.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/Port43594ForwardedNew.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/ServerSourceisOnline.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/jdk160_12isInstalled.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/PATHVariabledCreated.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/CLASSPATHVariableCreated.jpg[/img]
There we go, please help guys :)

item.title: I Can't Host My Server
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

This may be considered as advertising. But if you port forwarded and you still can’t login with that ip I really wouldn’t know the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: I Can't Host My Server
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

Instead of using wreckedcars.no-ip.biz change that to 0.0.0.0 then log on and on your portfoward change your protocol to both.

Read full topic

item.title: I Can't Host My Server
item.dc:creator: @power_on power_on
item.description:
@power_on wrote:

Darkning:

dont type in the server ip…[/quote] What do you mean?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 07:11:17 pm[/size][hr][quote=“hasumon, post:3, topic:260781”]In order for YOU to connect, you put in the IP part of the client to ‘127.0.0.1’ or leave it blank.

So I typed in wreckedcars.no-ip.biz into silab - isn’t that right?

What do you mean?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 07:21:25 pm[/size][hr]Okay great news for me - I didn’t type the server IP in, and it worked! I logged into the server.

However I couldn’t connect to the server on silab on another computer in my house… what do i need to do that?

Read full topic

item.title: I Can't Host My Server
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

In order for YOU to connect, you put in the IP part of the client to ‘127.0.0.1’ or leave it blank.

Read full topic

item.title: I Can't Host My Server
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

dont type in the server ip…

Read full topic
